descriptions:
['DescriptionTwo bedroom apartment
Located on the Ground Floor which is essentially Ground plus 2 as the building has basement parking
Views of the community and swimming pool with easy, direct access.
Property is available now for viewings and is also available for rent.
ROYAL BREEZE, a development consisting of apartments and villas ideally suited for an enjoyable lifestyle, each apartment has views of the Arabian Gulf or Lagoon and golf course. Complex has two swimming pools, gym, supermarket, children’s playground and recreational areas. Within walking distance you will find The Marina Yacht club, sailing club and a choice of restaurants.
AL HAMRA, Only 45 Minutes from Dubai Airport, situated between the Arabian Gulf and the Al Hajar Mountains, offers something for everyone with a choice of recreation facilities including water sports and golf. The resort is set around a championship golf course and natural lagoon where you can relax on one of the private beaches or unwind by one of the swimming pools. AL Hamra mall is the closest shopping centre where you will find an array of shops, supermarket, cinema, cafes and food court.
RAS AL KHAIMAH is the Emirate of beauty and contrast, with its 40 km coastline, mountain range and lush green areas. RAK is a cross between the old and the new, modern towns and shopping malls alongside bedoin villages and souqs.']

descriptions:
["Description5 Bedroom Villa
Plot Area: Starting 12,206 sqft.
GSA: 6,060 sqft.
Additional External Amenities:
Driver's Room with Bathroom
Fry Kitchen
Welcome to Jubail Island. 
A thriving and diverse master planned community surrounded by the tranquility of nature. 
A stylish island oasis of unparalleled beauty; positioned against the backdrop of UAE’s thriving capital city, where amazing architecture will blend seamlessly with the diverse natural environment to provide an unrivaled quality of life that is a dream come true.
A true sense of belonging.
Sprawled across 4,000 hectares of mangrove forests and coastal estuaries with more than 30 km of waterfront, Jubail Island will be home to 6 distinct village communities, with deliberately bespoke, breathtakingly picturesque residential areas and community facilities.
The planning was guided by the following four principles - each a hallmark of successful towns around the world: 
Discovery and Connectivity
Wellness and Activity
Just outside Abu Dhabi - between Yas Island and Saadiyat Island – Jubail Island is a neighborhood unlike any other in the United Arab Emirates.
Located in a protected natural environment of stunning beauty, its surrounding ecosystem supports a diversity of wildlife.
Jubail Island is reality - a stunning refuge within a community waiting to be explored, just outside the vibrant inner city. Its breathtaking landscape plays an integral part of the UAE’s rich and vital ecosystem.
Your journey into this sanctuary away from busy city life begins with a series of beautiful gateway experiences leading into a network of scenic drives, with views to the open water."]

haus & haus is pleased to present to you this immaculate one bedroom apartment in Ubora Towers.
The property has a beautiful view of the Burj Khalifa & Canal and is located centrally in Business Bay.
The Ubora building is a complex of two towers in the Business Bay district of Dubai, United Arab Emirates. The development consists of the Ubora Commercial Tower and the Ubora Residential Tower. Construction of the Ubora was completed in 2011.
The Ubora Commercial Tower, also known as the Ubora Tower 1, is a 58-story building. It has a total architectural height of 263 metres (862 ft). The Ubora Residential Tower, or Ubora Tower 2, is a 20-floor structure.
Call Charan (BRN: 28124) on +971507564835 for more information, to arrange a viewing or to make an offer.
Finance is available on this property through haus & haus partners. Please speak to us for more information.
For further details or to arrange viewings, please contact our Head Office on +97143025800.']

title_advert: ['Single Row Corner Plot with Park View in The Villa']
descriptions:
["DescriptionWhether you re a buyer looking for the perfect site to build your dream home or an investor taking advantage of Dubai s lucrative real estate market, Dubailand Oasis is an excellent investment opportunity with plots for villas, townhouses & low-rise residential buildings.
The Villa is a luxurious residential community in Dubailand with distinct Spanish-style villas. This community is ideal for families who desire tranquility away from the city, yet want easy accessibility to it at the same time! The Villa project consists of 1,811 villas with 4 to 6 bedrooms and six architectural styles to choose from.
The community center has the following shops:
-Spinneys Supermarket
-Costa Coffee cafe
-Oregano Italian Restaurant
-Tips and Toes Nail Spa
-Boots Pharmacy
-Currency Exchange/Western Union
-Photo Studio
-Super Trim Men's Salon
The community has the following facilities:
-Children's Playground
-Tennis Club/Sports Academy
-Gems First Point School (British Curriculum)
-Kids Zone (British Nursery)
-Mosque
Here are some of the nearby attractions:
-IMG Worlds of Adventure (Largest indoor theme park in the world) 5 mins away now open!
-Al Habtoor Polo Club and Resort opening in December 2016 is 3 mins away from The Villa and will offer all leisure facilities including a swimming pool, gym, horse riding and dining destinations."]
